title: Sequoia Translation
headline: Headline to go in the hero
hero: Experts in high quality Japanese - English translation, editing and proofreading
about: We specialise in translating and refining a wide range of professional, business, legal, educational and technical writing.
aboutText: ​We are committed to delivering top quality service and to building and maintaining the highest levels of client satisfaction and long term trust.
blockOneText:
We provide high quality Japanese-English translations.

Each translation is reviewed by a native English speaker and US lawyer with over 25 years of experience working internationally as a general counsel for major global corporations and technology ventures.
blockTwoText:
Based on our client’s needs and requests, we refine and check the accuracy of documents to:

+ simplify the text to ease understanding
+ raise the level of professionalism
+ proofread for proper syntax, spelling, grammar and punctuation.
blockThreeText:
Our native checking works to refine and ensure that the English document is written in a manner which clearly, properly and naturally communicates to English readers.  

If requested, we will adapt the tone and style to suit different types of audiences.
servicesText: We specialise in translating, refining and providing native checking for a wide range of business, technical, legal and academic writing.
blockFourText: We first confirm any cultural sensibilities, nuances and formalities which clients may want to be conveyed. We confirm the target audience and any requirements such as the tone, style and format that are to be reflected in the work.
blockFiveText: We're a team of professional, native Japanese and English speakers, with a deep understanding of Japanese culture and international business and years of experience in drafting, editing and teaching the skill of drafting high quality writing.
blockSixText:
Dissatisfaction is not an option. If you are not fully satisfied with our work, we will revise it at no extra charge. 

If you are still unhappy, we will provide a full refund
text:
Experts in high quality
Japanese - English
translation, editing-proofreading and native checking
